description: This file defines the frontend UI for a Database Viewer web application, including the layout, styles, and JavaScript logic for fetching, displaying, and interacting with database information and table data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases and updates the sidebar UI.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading the data and updating UI, triggered by a button.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database in the sidebar to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for the selected database and updates the UI.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data from a selected table within a database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds and inserts an HTML table to display data fetched from the backend.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cells based on data type and content size, including expandable cells for long text or objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expanding or collapsing cell content when clicked.
